getVisibleEntities

public ChangeSet getVisibleEntities(AgentProxy agent)
Description copied from interface: Perception
Determine what Entities are visible to a particular agent. The returned Entities should be copies of Entities in the ground-truth WorldModel. Only visible properties should have defined values.

Specified by:
getVisibleEntities in interface Perception
Parameters:
agent - The agent that is perceiving the world.
Returns:
A collection of entities that the agent can perceive.
